titleStmt.title: A spirituall propine of a pastour to his people
titleStmt.author: Melville, James, 1556-1614.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Walde-graue printer to the Kings Majestie.,

notesStmt.note: Dedication dated and signed: From Ansteruther, the 20. day of Nouember. 1598. .. Iames Maluill.
At foot of t.p.: Cum privilegio regio.
The publication date is in error for 1598 (STC).
"A morning vision", in verse, has separate title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Errors in paging: p. 49 is numbered 46; p. 151 misnumbered 150.
Imperfect: copy at reel 574:7 is an incomplete filming.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
